institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 31 (Prohibition of unfair trade practices, etc.)
contents: Article 31 (Prohibition of unfair trade practices, etc.) When concluding a contract using government subsidies, the business group shall not engage in unfair trade practices in accordance with Articles 23 and 23-2 of the Monopoly Regulation and Fair Trade Act. .
